New IMF research on the EU: A country’s economic wellbeing is closely associated with jobs for the youth. Incentivizing work for the young—easing social security contributions, lowering taxes on low-wage workers - can strengthen society across generations https://t.co/H0JkS6XgpA https://t.co/qC4dxsp1rw

Over the past 10 years, poverty and inequality across generations in the EU has increased. Today, 1 in 4 people are at risk of poverty. How this trend can be reversed: https://t.co/2tWqsV2sbl https://t.co/a8qFhIHwwm
